page.title: 06A 12 Year Old Girl's Day
page.content: It is Wednesday so we go straight to a double English lesson. I walk in still holding my tennis raquet, so I have to rush down and put it in the changing rooms. Next we have cookery. I spend break washing up. I have all the ingredients this time but I have just got it into the oven when it is time for my piano lesson. I have actually practised and she is very pleased and says I could do Grade 1 at Easter. Next we have French; Madame Walker writes the vocabulary so fast on the blackboard that I haven't finished the first lot when she rubs it off and starts thr second. Then we have Classical Studies with Mrs Gay. We are doing "An Athenian Woman's Wedding" and she dictates notes so fast our arms nearly fall off trying to catch up with her! PTO
